workoutPlans.title: Strength Training for Beginners
workoutPlans.description: A comprehensive strength training program for beginners.
workoutPlans.details: This workout plan is designed for individuals who are new to strength training and want to build a foundation of strength. The plan consists of three strength training sessions per week, with each session focusing on different muscle groups.

workoutPlans.title: Fat Loss and Toning
workoutPlans.description: A workout plan to help you burn fat and tone your body.
workoutPlans.details: This workout plan is designed to help you lose body fat and sculpt a lean physique. The plan consists of four workout sessions per week, alternating between cardio and strength training.

workoutPlans.title: Cardiovascular Workout Plan
workoutPlans.description: An effective cardio workout plan to improve cardiovascular fitness.
workoutPlans.details: This workout plan is designed to improve cardiovascular fitness and burn calories. It includes various cardio exercises that can be done indoors or outdoors. Aim to perform these exercises at a moderate to high intensity for the best results.

workoutPlans.title: Flexibility and Mobility Routine
workoutPlans.description: A stretching and mobility routine to improve flexibility and mobility.
workoutPlans.details: This routine focuses on improving flexibility and mobility through a variety of stretching exercises. It is suitable for all fitness levels and can be done as a standalone routine or as a warm-up or cool-down for other workouts.

workoutPlans.title: HIIT Workout Plan
workoutPlans.description: A high-intensity interval training (HIIT) workout plan for maximum calorie burn.
workoutPlans.details: This workout plan incorporates high-intensity interval training (HIIT) exercises to maximize calorie burn and improve cardiovascular fitness. HIIT workouts involve short bursts of intense exercise followed by periods of rest or low-intensity activity.

exercises.name: Sprint Intervals
exercises.duration: 10 sets of 30 seconds sprinting, 30 seconds rest

exercises.name: Circuit Training
exercises.duration: 5 sets of 1 minute per exercise with 30 seconds rest

exercises.name: Tabata Intervals
exercises.duration: 8 sets of 20 seconds high-intensity exercise, 10 seconds rest

workoutPlans.title: Yoga and Meditation Plan
workoutPlans.description: A yoga and meditation plan for stress relief and relaxation.
workoutPlans.details: This plan combines yoga poses and meditation techniques to promote relaxation, reduce stress, and improve overall well-being. It is suitable for all fitness levels and can be practiced at home or in a yoga studio.

workoutPlans.title: Bodyweight Workout Plan
workoutPlans.description: A workout plan that uses only bodyweight exercises to build strength and endurance.
workoutPlans.details: This workout plan is designed for individuals who prefer to train using their own bodyweight. It consists of a variety of exercises that target different muscle groups and can be performed anywhere without the need for equipment.

mealPlans.title: Healthy Eating Meal Plan
mealPlans.description: A balanced and nutritious meal plan for healthy eating.
mealPlans.details: This meal plan is designed to provide a balanced and nutritious diet for overall health and well-being. It includes three main meals and two snacks per day, with a focus on whole foods and portion control.

mealPlans.title: Vegetarian Meal Plan
mealPlans.description: A delicious and nutritious meal plan for vegetarians.
mealPlans.details: This vegetarian meal plan is designed to provide a well-rounded diet without meat. It includes a variety of plant-based proteins, whole grains, fruits, and vegetables to ensure you meet your nutritional needs.

mealPlans.title: Gluten-Free Meal Plan
mealPlans.description: A gluten-free meal plan for individuals with gluten intolerance or sensitivity.
mealPlans.details: This gluten-free meal plan excludes all sources of gluten, such as wheat, barley, and rye. It focuses on naturally gluten-free ingredients and offers a variety of options for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks.

mealPlans.title: High-Protein Meal Plan
mealPlans.description: A meal plan designed to provide a high intake of protein for muscle growth and recovery.
mealPlans.details: This high-protein meal plan focuses on lean protein sources to support muscle growth and recovery. It includes three main meals and two snacks per day, with an emphasis on incorporating protein-rich foods into each meal.

mealPlans.title: Low-Carb Meal Plan
mealPlans.description: A meal plan designed to reduce carbohydrate intake and promote weight loss.
mealPlans.details: This low-carb meal plan focuses on reducing carbohydrate intake while increasing the consumption of healthy fats and protein. It includes three main meals and two snacks per day, with an emphasis on non-starchy vegetables and lean protein sources.

mealPlans.title: Vegan Meal Plan
mealPlans.description: A plant-based meal plan suitable for vegans, emphasizing nutrient-rich ingredients.
mealPlans.details: This vegan meal plan is designed to provide a well-rounded plant-based diet, rich in nutrients and flavors. It includes three main meals and two snacks per day, with an emphasis on whole grains, legumes, fruits, and vegetables.
